# networkIdentifier

**Instance Property**

A unique identifier for a Downlink Time-Difference-of-Arrival network.

## Declaration

```swift
var networkIdentifier: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this to the value of the session ID in the anchor’s configuration.
title: networkIdentifier
